predicate.note: Frames file for 'dodge' based on sentences in financial subcorpus and automatic expansion via verbnet.

example.name: dodge ball
example.text: In 1986, Mr. Roderick adroitly dodged Mr. Icahn's first bullet after the takeover specialist had built up an 11.4% stake.
example.arg: after the takeover specialist had built up an 11.4% stake
